title: Smashing Pumpkins - The Best of the Adore Tour (Glacier)
description:
This compilation includes some of the very best live performances by the Smashing Pumpkins from the band's 1998 world tour in support of their fourth album Adore.


1 To Sheila (August 4, 1998)
2 Tear (July 28, 1998)
3 Once Upon a Time (May 26, 1998)
4 The Tale of Dusty and Pistol Pete (July 29, 1998)
5 Ava Adore (August 4, 1998)
6 Crestfallen (June 19, 1998)
7 Stumbleine (May 28, 1998)
8 Perfect (June 1, 1998)
9 Let Me Give the World to You (May 21, 1998)
10 Shame (July 29, 1998)
11 For Martha (July 29, 1998)
12 Blank Page (August 4, 1998)
13 Transmission (August 4, 1998)
